question: Which of the following was the main reason for the annexation of Berar?
option1: The Nizam of Berar had no adopted son
option2: The abundance of raw materials of textile industry
option3: The Nizam of Berar attacked the British
answer: The abundance of raw materials of textile industry
explanation: Berar had a huge potential to supply raw materials to the textile industries of Britain. That was the main reason for the annexation of Berar in the year 1853. Though it was said that the Nizam of Berar failed to pay the outstanding money of the British.
